items.name: static var unicast: CWCipherKeyFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates to use the cipher key for unicast packets.

items.name: static var multicast: CWCipherKeyFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates to use the cipher key for multicast packets.

items.name: static var tx: CWCipherKeyFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates to use the cipher key for packets sent from the interface.

items.name: static var rx: CWCipherKeyFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates to use the cipher key for packets received by the interface.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a cipher key flags structure with the specified raw value.
